sys_element_mapping.value:
#!/bin/bash
result=$(cat <<EOF import os os.environ['DISPLAY'] = ':0' import pywhatkit pywhatkit.sendwhatmsg_to_group_instantly("Kg4VwqsCMOwCFu3NBAEtwC", "Critical Incident {{action.number}} , Short Description-{{action.short_description}} is created.")
EOF )
python3 -c "$result"
